testcase.name: User will get his ride estimation
testcase.system-out: Given User have no resulet..................................................passed When User browse to the Lyft Home page WebSite.............................passed Then Lyft Home page ride should display....................................passed Then User click on Rider link button........................................passed And Lyft Rider page ride should display....................................passed Then User enter pick up Location as "19 Cornish St , Staten Island NY"......passed And User enter drop off Location as "220 Riverside blvd , New York NY"......passed And User click on Get Estimate button.......................................passed Then Lyft price estimator table should display.............................passed

testcase.classname: Explain and Show how Uber WebSite
testcase.system-out: Given User have no result...................................................passed When User browse to the Uber ride estimation page...........................passed Then Uber ride estimation page should display..............................passed Then User enter pick up location as "19 Cornish st ,Staten Island NY "......passed And User enter drop off location as " 220 Riverside blvd , New York NY".....passed Then Uber price estimator table should display.............................passed
